title: Chinese state-owned bank issues $600m onchain digital yuan bonds
description: Bank issues over $637m worth of bonds All purchases were made using digital yuan wallets Huaxia is majority state-owned
content:
A state-owned bank in China has issued one of the countrys first-ever commercial bonds on a blockchain.
Huaxia Bank distributed the bonds to customers paying exclusively in Chinas central bank digit… [+2413 chars]
